footer.text: Character Guide • Playstyle: Cyno | Update Date: 10/05/2022 | Editor: Luno#1337

description:
__Character Overview__
Cyno, as contradictory as it may be, is both a straightforward yet complex character to play. Largely owing to his kit which revolves around the unique mechanic in his ‘Endseer’ — an eye that encompasses the whole screen in gameplay that empowers his Skill during its presence. 

To best play Cyno, there are certain techiques and tips to take into account and master. Mainly:
```
Use Cyno’s Elemental Skill before his Burst, as the higher CD is reduced in his Burst state, to pre-funnel 3 flat electro particles into his Burst-energy meter;

During Cyno’s Burst state — instead of spamming his Elemental Skill off-CD — opt to hold onto his E so that it will not desync/ be on CD when the Eye shrouds the screen;

The first Eye has a longer interval before appearing compared to the other Eyes, with a total of 4 Eyes over the course of Cyno’s full combo. 
```

__Fixed Combos__
These are combos that players can follow which are optimized for usability and practicality, number of Electro Applications, and to benefit from all 4 Eye intervals:
> For non-4TF players 
*eQ n3e n5E n5 n1E n5 n2E (n5 n1E)*
> For 4TF Cyno players: 
*eQ n1e n4e n4E n5E n4e n4E (n5 n1E)* 
```
n(X) = press auto attack button (X) amount of times 
e = Tap Skill
E = Endseer-induced Tap Skill  
Q = Burst 
() = optional for players looking to cut Cyno’s field-time 
```
title: Cyno | Playstyle
